question: Why do you need to add a column name in GROUP BY? There are possibly multiple valid answers
option_a: Because you always have to group at least one column in a query
option_b: Because you used calculation functions with at least one column in your query
option_c: To aggregate data based on this column
option_d: This is necessary in order to use multiple columns in a query
